org.gatorgradle

Class GatorGradlePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gatorgradle.GatorGradlePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>

    public class GatorGradlePlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>
    GatorGradlePlugin applies the plugin to a project, registers the grade task, and sets up some sensible defaults. TODO: allow DSL configuration block to specify CONFIG_FILE_LOCATION and GATORGRADER_HOME.
